title: Pumpkin Cottage Cheese Pancakes
description: Moist, flavorful pancakes with a protein-rich twist, perfect for a fall breakfast.
ingredients: 1/3 cup egg whites or 2 whole eggs
instructions: Add all ingredients up to the butter or oil to a blender. Blend until smooth, adding milk if needed. Let batter rest for 5 minutes. Heat pan with oil or butter. Pour batter and cook for 3 minutes, flip and cook for 1-2 more minutes. Top as desired and serve.

title: Tofu Pancakes
description: Protein-packed tofu pancakes that go great with berry compote or yogurt.
instructions: Blend all ingredients except oil or butter until smooth. Heat a pan and cook pancakes in small rounds for 5 minutes, flip, and cook 1-2 more minutes. Top and enjoy.

title: Whole Wheat Pancakes
description: Classic hearty pancakes with whole wheat flour, perfect for a nourishing breakfast.
instructions: Mix wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry ingredients in another. Combine both, stir until just combined. Cook in oiled pan for 3-4 minutes, flip, cook another 1-2 minutes. Makes 8-10 small pancakes.
